case_diary_summary: Status: Pending. Initial FIR lodged. Victim statement recorded. CCTV footage from nearby ATM sent for enhancement. Awaiting forensic report on fingerprints.
Status: Closed. Suspect identified and arrested based on eyewitness testimony. Charge sheet filed. Final report submitted.
Status: Pending. IP address traced to a different state. Request sent to ISP for user details. Awaiting ISP response.
Status: Pending. Victim injured, statement pending full recovery. Sketch of suspect being prepared. Witness unavailable, has left town temporarily.
Status: Closed. Stolen goods recovered from local pawn shop. Suspects apprehended based on shop's CCTV. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Closed. Tourist's wallet stolen on beach. No witnesses or CCTV footage. Suspect not identified. Case closed as undetected.
Status: Pending. Online job scam. Bank account details of suspect frozen. Awaiting bank compliance report. Victim statement recorded.
Status: Pending. Clash between two student groups. Video footage collected. Identification of all involved parties is in progress.
Status: Closed. Victim rescued from nearby district. Accused arrested. All parties known to each other. Final report submitted.
Status: Pending. Chain snatching incident. CCTV footage from the area is grainy. CCTV footage sent for enhancement.
Status: Pending. House broken into at night. Awaiting forensic report on fingerprints. Modus operandi matches local gang.
Status: Pending. Theft of copper wire from plant. Insider involvement suspected. Employee logbooks being audited. Key witness unavailable.
Status: Closed. Dispute between two shopkeepers. Both parties reached a compromise. Case closed after mutual agreement.
Status: Closed. Motorcycle theft. Vehicle not recovered. No leads or witnesses. Final report submitted as undetected.
Status: Pending. Fake lottery ticket scam. Phone number of accused is out of service. Awaiting bank compliance report on linked account.
Status: Pending. Phishing email complaint from IT company. Malicious IP address identified. Awaiting ISP response for user details.
Status: Closed. Tourist robbed on beach. Accused caught by patrol car nearby. Stolen items recovered. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Pending. Attempted burglary. Suspect fled the scene. Awaiting forensic report on footprints. Witness statement recorded.
Status: Closed. Minor scuffle. Parties warned and case closed on mutual understanding.
Status: Pending. Laptop stolen from car. No CCTV coverage in the parking lot. Witness unavailable (out of station).
Status: Pending. Mobile snatching. Bike number partially noted. Checking CCTV footage from all exit routes. CCTV footage sent for enhancement.
Status: Closed. Shoplifting case. Suspect identified from in-store CCTV and apprehended. Goods recovered.
Status: Pending. Victim's family statement recorded. Accused (husband) arrested. Awaiting post-mortem report. Awaiting forensic report.
Status: Pending. Fake accommodation booking scam. Website and bank details collected. Awaiting bank compliance report.
Status: Closed. Land dispute. Both parties brought to station, dispute mediated and resolved amicably. Case closed.
Status: Pending. Vehicle theft. Checking CCTV footage from entry/exit points of the city. All-points bulletin issued.
Status: Closed. No fingerprints found. No witnesses. No CCTV. Case closed as undetected.
Status: Pending. Social media account hacking. Awaiting ISP response from social media platform.
Status: Closed. Accused caught by public and handed over to police. Stolen items recovered. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Pending. Theft from temple. CCTV footage is unclear. Awaiting forensic report on broken lock.
Status: Pending. Laptop stolen from office. Key witness unavailable (on leave). Internal security footage being reviewed.
Status: Pending. Fight between tourists. One party has left the city. Efforts being made to contact them. Witness statement recorded.
Status: Pending. Industrial accident. Awaiting technical report from factory inspector. Awaiting post-mortem report.
Status: Closed. Suspect identified and arrested. Stolen items partially recovered. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Pending. Pickpocketing at bus stand. No CCTV. Victim could not identify suspect. Case is under observation.
Status: Pending. Financial fraud (UPI). Money trail being traced. Awaiting bank compliance report.
Status: Closed. Road rage incident. Both parties apologized and settled. Case closed.
Status: Closed. Bicycle theft. No leads. Case closed as undetected.
Status: Pending. Theft from vehicle. CCTV footage sent for enhancement. Patrolling increased in the area.
Status: Pending. Shop burglary. Awaiting forensic report on fingerprints. Similar MO to other recent burglaries.
Status: Pending. Highway robbery. Victim's statement recorded. Modus operandi suggests professional gang. Awaiting forensic report on vehicle.
Status: Closed. Livestock theft. Animals recovered from nearby village. Accused arrested. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Pending. Illegal mining complaint. Joint task force with revenue department. Awaiting technical report on seized materials.
Status: Closed. Minor dispute. Parties compromised. Case closed.
Status: Pending. Theft at industrial park. CCTV footage sent for enhancement. Security guard's statement recorded. Witness unavailable.
Status: Closed. Contraband seized from fishing vessel. Accused arrested in joint operation with Coast Guard. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Pending. Elephant tusk found. Awaiting forensic report. Informant network activated. Joint investigation with Forest Dept.
Status: Pending. Complaint from transport company. Call records being analyzed. Awaiting bank compliance report on provided account.
Status: Closed. No leads, no witnesses. Case closed as undetected.
Status: Pending. Theft of construction materials. Site manager's statement recorded. Awaiting forensic report.
Status: Closed. Fight between neighbors. Compromise reached. Case closed.
Status: Pending. Fake profile and harassment. Awaiting ISP response from social media platform.
Status: Closed. Suspect caught red-handed by patrol. Stolen item recovered.
Status: Pending. Awaiting forensic report on fingerprints. Witness statement recorded.
Status: Closed. Bag stolen from beach. No witnesses. Case closed as undetected.
Status: Closed. Accused returned the money after FIR. Victim withdrew complaint. Case closed.
Status: Pending. Victim statement recorded. Accused is absconding. Search is ongoing.
Status: Pending. Theft from a moving vehicle. Witness statement recorded. No clear leads.
Status: Pending. Chain snatching. CCTV footage sent for enhancement. Suspects on bike, number plate not visible.
Status: Pending. Theft of idols from a small temple. Awaiting forensic report. Informant network activated.
Status: Pending. Online payment fraud. Money trail being traced. Awaiting bank compliance report.
Status: Closed. Minor dispute between pilgrims. Mediated and resolved.
Status: Pending. Agricultural equipment stolen. No witnesses. Patrolling increased.
Status: Pending. Fake job promise. Victim statement recorded. Call records of accused being analyzed.
Status: Closed. Suspect (ex-employee) identified from CCTV and arrested. Stolen items recovered. Charge sheet filed.
Status: Closed. No leads. Case closed as undetected.
Status: Closed. Compromise reached between parties.
Status: Pending. Scrap metal theft. Security guard's statement recorded. Awaiting forensic report.
Status: Pending. Mobile snatching. CCTV footage sent for enhancement. Victim was unable to identify suspect.
Status: Pending. Theft from apartment. No signs of forced entry. Domestic help is primary suspect. Witness unavailable.
Status: Pending. Land dispute, forged documents. Awaiting forensic report on signatures. Legal opinion sought.
Status: Closed. Dispute resolved amicably.
Status: Pending. Motorcycle theft. Checking CCTV footage.
